original: īdṛśaṃ ca atra brahmaṇa upāsyatvaṃ yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām // 5 //
analyzed: īdṛśam ca atra brahmaṇaḥ upāsya tvam yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇam pratimā ādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām  /
brahma dṛṣṭiḥ utkarṣāt
praśna pūrvakam saṃśaya bījam āha kutas ityādinā

nā api prakṛti vikāra bhāva nibandhanam

original: ataḥ pariśeṣādadhyāsa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyakāraṇam adhyāse ca niyāmakābhāvātsaṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas pariśeṣāt adhyāsaḥ eva sāmānādhikaraṇya kāraṇam adhyāse ca niyāmaka abhāvāt saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ
utkṛṣṭa nikṛṣṭayoḥ nikṛṣṭam api upāsyam phalavat tvāt iti nyāyaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti aruceḥ āha athavā iti
atra vikāra dṛṣṭibhiḥ brahma upāsti siddhiḥ phalam

original: siddhānte tu vikāradṛṣṭyā brahmaṇa upāsyatve nikarṣaprāptau satyāṃ phalavattvāsiddhervikārā evotkṛṣṭabrahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti phalam /
analyzed: siddhānte tu vikāra dṛṣṭyā brahmaṇaḥ upāsya tve nikarṣa prāptau satyām phalavat tva asiddheḥ vikārāḥ eva utkṛṣṭa brahma dṛṣṭyā upāsyāḥ iti phalam

original: kiñca laukikanyāyāviruddhārthasaṃbhave viruddhārtho na grāhyaḥ pratyavāyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: kiñca laukika nyāya aviruddha artha saṃbhave viruddha arthaḥ na grāhyaḥ pratyavāya prasaṅgāt
kiñca prathama śrutānām āditya ādi padānām asaṃjāta virodhi tayā mukhya artha tva grahaḥ nyāyyaḥ
brahma śabde ca dṛṣṭi lakṣaṇa āgrahaḥ

original: tathā cādityādayo brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā ityeva vākyārtha ityāha-prāthamyācceti /
analyzed: tathā ca āditya ādayaḥ brahma dṛṣṭyā upāsyāḥ iti eva vākya arthaḥ iti āha prāthamyāt ca iti
brahma śabdasya eva dṛṣṭi artha tve hetu antaram āha eti paratvāt iti

original: itiśabdaśiraskaḥ śabdaḥ samabhivyāhṛtakriyālakṣaka iti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /

original: siddhādityādyātmanā karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭau karmatvahāniḥ syādityata āha-ādityādibhāveneti /
analyzed: siddhāt ityādi ātmanā karmaṇām dṛṣṭau karma tva hāniḥ syāt iti atas āha āditya ādi bhāvena iti
māṇavake gni dṛṣṭi vat udgītha ādiṣu āditya ādi dhiyām gauṇa tvāt na karmatva abhibhāvaka tvam iti aṅgeṣu anaṅga tva dhīra viruddha iti āśayaḥ
prayoga anupapattim uktām nirasyati tat etat iti
lakṣaṇā bījam saṃbandham āha lakṣaṇā ca iti
gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti atra saṃnikṛṣṭa saṃyoga saṃbandhena tīra lakṣaṇā
agniḥ māṇavakaḥ iti atra agni niṣṭha śuci tva ādi guṇavat tva rūpa paramparā saṃbandhena lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭā

original: tathā cātra ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyāgnidṛṣṭipakṣe 'pi ṛksāmapadābhyāṃ svavācyārthe draṣṭavyatākhyaparamparāsaṃbandhena pṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā yuktetyarthaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca atra ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivī āgni dṛṣṭi pakṣe ṛk sāma padābhyām sva vācyārthe draṣṭavya tā ākhya paramparā saṃbandhena pṛthivī agni lakṣaṇā yuktā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu pratīkavācipadasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā,
analyzed: nanu pratīka vāci padasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā
kṣatṛ padasya rājanya prayogāt iti śaṅkate tatra yadi api iti

original: tathāpi ṛksāmasaṃbandhātpṛthivyagnyorevaitasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāmeti mukhyayoḥ pṛthaguktestadetasyāmityatrāpi tayorgrahe punaruktiḥ syāt,
analyzed: tathā api ṛk sāma saṃbandhāt pṛthivī agnyoḥ eva etasyām ṛci adhyūḍham sāma iti mukhyayoḥ pṛthak ukteḥ tat etasyām iti atra api tayoḥ grahe punaruktiḥ syāt

original: ataḥ pratīkābhedadṛṣṭyā pṛthivyagnyoḥ pratīkasaṃnidhānāttayoreva pratīkapadaprayogaḥ kṛtastabhedadārḍhyāyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas pratīka abheda dṛṣṭyā pṛthivī agnyoḥ pratīka saṃnidhānāt tayoḥ eva pratīka pada prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ tad bheda dārḍhyāya iti arthaḥ
tarhi kṣattṛ śabdaḥ u pi rājani syāt iti atas āha kṣatri iti

original: sthitaprayogasya nimittaṃ kimapi vācyaṃ na tu nimittamastīti prayoga āpādya iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sthita prayogasya nimittam kim api vācyam na tu nimittam asti iti prayogaḥ āpādyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: tasya kāryaṃ rathacaryādi yadā rājeva karoti tadā kṣattṛśabdo rājanyapyastītyakṣarārthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya kāryam ratha caryā ādi yadā rājā iva karoti tadā kṣattṛ śabdaḥ rājani api asti iti akṣara arthaḥ

original: sāmātmanā lokānupāsīteti dvitīyāsaptamyorbhaṅgastvayā kāryastato varaṃ lokātmanā sāmopāsīteti saptamīmātrabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sāma ātmanā lokān upāsīta iti dvitīyā saptamyoḥ bhaṅgaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ tatas varam loka ātmanā sāma upāsīta iti saptamī mātra bhaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: eteneti ekavibhaktibhaṅgalāghavena prāṇātmanā gāyatraṃ sāmopāsyamiti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /

original: 'sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhu'ityupakramya pṛthivī hiṅgāra ityādinā hiṅgārādipañcāvayavasya sāmna upāsanamuktvā 'iti tu pañcavidhasyopāsanam'ityupasaṃhṛtya,

original: atheti saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanaṃ prakramya prapañcitamataḥ sāmna evopāsyatvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atha iti saptavidhasya sāmnaḥ upāsanam prakramya prapañcitam atas sāmnaḥ eva upāsya tvam iti arthaḥ

original: jñānātpuṇyaṃ kṣīyate na veti pūrvavatsaṃdehe jñānaṃ tu na puṇyanāśakaṃ śāstrīyatvātpuṇyavadityadhikāśaṅkāmuktvātideśaṃ vyācaṣṭe-dharmasyetyādinā
analyzed: jñānāt puṇyam kṣīyate na vā iti pūrvavat saṃdehe jñānam tu na puṇya nāśakam śāstrīya tvāt puṇya vat iti adhika āśaṅkām uktvā atideśam vyācaṣṭe dharmasya ityādinā
jñānam puṇya nāśakam sa mūlavidyā ghāti tvāt iti nyāya upeta āgama bādhitam anumānam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutiḥ pāpaviṣayā sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ taratīti viśeṣaśruterityata āha-yatrāpi kevala iti /
analyzed: nanu kṣīyante ca iti a viśeṣa śrutiḥ pāpa viṣayā sarvam pāpmānam tarati iti viśeṣa śruteḥ iti atas āha yatra api kevale iti
pāpa puṇya kṣaya para adhikaraṇa dvayasya phalam āha pāte tu iti

anārabdha adhikaraṇam sū

original: anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
analyzed: anārabdha kārye eva tu pūrve tad avadheḥ

original: pūrvayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ jñānanimittaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vināśaḥ avadhāritaḥ sa kim
analyzed: pūrvayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ jñāna nimittaḥ sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ vināśaḥ avadhāritaḥ sa kim

original: aviśeṣeṇa ārabdhakāryayoḥ anārabdhakāryayoḥ ca bhavati uta viśeṣeṇa anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva iti vicāryate /
analyzed: aviśeṣeṇa ārabdha kāryayoḥ anārabdhakāryayoḥ ca bhavati uta viśeṣeṇa anārabdha kāryayoḥ eva iti vicāryate
tatra ubhe u ha eva eṣa ete tarati

original: iti evamādiśrutiṣu aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva kṣaya iti /
analyzed: iti evamādi śrutiṣu aviśeṣa śravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva kṣayaḥ iti

original: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - anārabdhakārye eva tu iti /
analyzed: evam prāpte pratyāha anārabdha kārye eva tu iti

original: apravṛttaphale eva pūrve janmāntarasaṃcite asmin api ca janmani prāk jñāna utpatteḥ
analyzed: apravṛtta phale eva pūrve janma antara saṃcite asmin api ca janmani prāk jñāna utpatteḥ

original: saṃcite sukṛtaduṣkṛte jñāna adhigamāt kṣīyete na tu ārabdhakārye sāmibhuktaphale
analyzed: saṃcite sukṛta duṣkṛte jñāna adhigamāt kṣīyete na tu ārabdha kārye sāmibhukta phale

original: yābhyām etat brahmajñāna āyatanaṃ janma nirmitam /
analyzed: yābhyām etat brahma jñāna āyatanam janma nirmitam

original: kuta etat - 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2)
analyzed: kutas etat tasya tāvat eva ciram yāvat na vimokṣye saṃpatsye
iti śarīrapātau adhikaraṇāt kṣema prāpteḥ

original: itarathā hi jñānāt aśeṣakarmakṣaye sati sthitihetu abhāvāt jñānaprāpti anantarameva kṣemamśnu avīta,
analyzed: itarathā hi jñānāt aśeṣa karma kṣaye sati sthiti hetu abhāvāt jñāna prāpti anantaram eva kṣemam śnu avīta
tatra śarīrapāta pratīkṣām na ācakṣīta

original: nanu vastubalena eva ayam akartṛ ātmāvabodhaḥ karmāṇi kṣapayan kathaṃ kānicit kṣapayet kānicit ca upekṣeta /
analyzed: nanu vastu balena eva ayam akartṛ ātma avabodhaḥ karmāṇi kṣapayan katham kānicid kṣapayet kānicid ca upekṣeta

original: na hi samāne agnibījasaṃparke keṣāñcit bījaśaktiḥ kṣīyate keṣāñcit na kṣīyata iti śakyam aṅgīkartum iti /
analyzed: na hi samāne agni bīja saṃparke keṣāñcid bīja śaktiḥ kṣīyate keṣāñcid na kṣīyate iti śakyam aṅgīkartum iti

original: ucyate - na tāvat anāśritya ārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayaṃ jñāna utpattiḥ upapadyate /
analyzed: ucyate na tāvat an āśritya ārabdhakāryam karmāśayam jñāna utpattiḥ upapadyate

original: āśrite ca tasmin kulālacakravat pravṛttavegasya antarāle pratibandha asaṃbhavāt bhavati vegakṣayapratipālanam /
analyzed: āśrite ca tasmin kulāla cakra vat pravṛtta vegasya antarāle pratibandha asaṃbhavāt bhavati vega kṣaya pratipālanam

original: akartṛ ātmabodhaḥ api hi mithyājñānabādhanena karmāṇi ucchinatti /
analyzed: akartṛ ātma bodhaḥ api hi mithyājñāna bādhanena karmāṇi ucchinatti

original: bādhitam api tu mithyājñānaṃ dvicandrajñānavat saṃskāravaśāt kañcitkālam anuvartata eva /
analyzed: bādhitam api tu mithyājñānam dvi candra jñāna vat saṃskāra vaśāt kañcid kālam anuvartate eva

original: api ca na eva atra vivaditavyaṃ brahmavidā kañcitkālaṃ śarīraṃ dhriyate na vā dhriyata iti /
analyzed: api ca na eva atra vivaditavyam brahma vidā kañcitkālam śarīram dhriyate na vā dhriyate iti

original: kathaṃ hi ekasya svahṛdayapratyayaṃ brahmavedanaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca apareṇa pratikṣeptuṃ śakyeta /
analyzed: katham hi ekasya sva hṛdaya pratyayam brahma vedanam deha dhāraṇam ca apareṇa pratikṣeptum śakyeta
śruti smṛtiṣu ca sthita prajña lakṣaṇa nirdeśena etat eva nirucyate

original: tasmāt anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya iti nirṇayaḥ // 15 //
analyzed: tasmāt anārabdha kāryayoḥ eva sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ vidyā sāmarthyāt kṣayaḥ iti nirṇayaḥ  /
anārabdha kārye eva tu

original: uktakarmakṣayaṃ viṣayīkṛtya kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutestasya tāvadeva ciramiti śruteśca saṃśayamāha-pūrvayoriti /
analyzed: ukta karma kṣayam viṣayīkṛtya kṣīyante ca iti aviśeṣa śruteḥ tasya tāvat eva ciram iti śruteḥ ca saṃśayam āha pūrvayoḥ iti
jīvanmukti asiddhiḥ tad siddhiḥ ca iti ubhayatra phalam

original: pūrvasiddhāntanyāyena pūrvapakṣaprāptau uktotsargataḥ karmakṣatiḥ prārabdhānyakarmaviṣayetyapavādaṃ siddhānyati-evamiti /
analyzed: pūrva siddhānta nyāyena pūrvapakṣa prāptau ukta utsargataḥ karma kṣatiḥ prārabdha anya karma viṣayā iti apavādam siddhāni ati evam iti
sāmi śabda ūrdhva vācakaḥ

original: prārabdhādyāvanna vimucyate tāvāneva vilambastanmokṣe brahma saṃpadyata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
analyzed: prārabdhāt yāvat na vimucyate tāvān eva vilambaḥ tad mokṣe brahma saṃpadyate iti śruti arthaḥ
dehapāta avadhi liṅgāt tattva vidām yājñavalkya ādīnām deha dhāraṇa śruti smṛti liṅgāt ca prārabdha karmaṇaḥ tattva jñānam
prati hetu tvena upajīvya tvāt ca prābalya siddheḥ tad pratibaddham tattva jñānam tad siddhi artham avidyā aṃśam
vikṣepaśakti ākhyam vihāya avaraka avidyā aṃśam nāśayati iti āha ucyate na tāvat iti
vikṣepaka avidyā leśaḥ eva tad saṃskāraḥ
śiṣyān prati jīvanmuktau sva anubhavam āha api ca na eva iti

agnihotra ādi adhikaraṇam sū
agnihotra ādi tu tad kāryāya eva tad darśanāt

original: puṇyasya api aśleṣavināśayoḥ aghanyāyaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ saḥ atideśaḥ sarvapuṇyaviṣaya iti āśaṅkya prativakti - agnihotrādi tu iti /
analyzed: puṇyasya api aśleṣa vināśayoḥ agha nyāyaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ saḥ atideśaḥ sarva puṇya viṣayaḥ iti āśaṅkya prativakti agnihotra ādi tu iti
tu śabdaḥ āśaṅkām upanudati

original: yat nityaṃ karma vaidikam agnihotrādi tat tat kāryāya eva bhavati,
analyzed: yat nityam karma vaidikam agnihotra ādi tat tat kāryāya eva bhavati

original: jñānasya yatkāryaṃ tadeva asya api kāryam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: jñānasya yat kāryam tat eva asya api kāryam iti arthaḥ

original: kutaḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
analyzed: kutas tam etam veda anuvacanena brāhmaṇāḥ vividiṣanti yajñena dānena
ityādi darśanāt

original: nanu jñānakarmaṇoḥ vilakṣaṇakāryatvāt kārya ekatva anupapattiḥ /
analyzed: nanu jñāna karmaṇoḥ vilakṣaṇa kāryatvāt kārya ekatva anupapattiḥ
na eṣa doṣaḥ
jvara maraṇa kāryayoḥ api dadhi viṣayoḥ guḍa mantra saṃyuktayoḥ tṛpti puṣṭi kārya darśanāt

original: tadvat karmaṇaḥ api jñānasaṃyuktasya mokṣakārya upapatteḥ /
analyzed: tadvat karmaṇaḥ api jñāna saṃyuktasya mokṣa kārya upapatteḥ

original: nanu anārabhyo mokṣaḥ katham asya karmakāryatvam ucyate /
analyzed: nanu anārabhyaḥ mokṣaḥ katham asya karma kārya tvam ucyate
na eṣa doṣaḥ
ārāt upakāraka tvāt karmaṇaḥ

original: jñānasya eva hi prāpakaṃ satkarma prāṇāḍyā mokṣakāraṇam iti upacaryate /
analyzed: jñānasya eva hi prāpakam sat karma prāṇāḍyā mokṣa kāraṇam iti upacaryate

original: ata eva ca atikrāntaviṣayam etat kārya ekatva abhidhānam /
analyzed: atas eva ca atikrānta viṣayam etat kārya ekatva abhidhānam

original: na hi brahmavida āgāmi agnihotrādi saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi brahma vidaḥ āgāmi agnihotra ādi saṃbhavati
a niyojya brahma ātmatva pratipatteḥ śāstrasya aviṣaya tvāt

original: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu kartṛtva anativṛtteḥ saṃbhavati āgāmi api agnihotrādi /
analyzed: saguṇāsu tu vidyāsu kartṛ tva anativṛtteḥ saṃbhavati āgāmi api agnihotrādi

original: tasya api nirabhisaṃdhinaḥ kāryāntara abhāvāt vidyāsaṃgati upapattiḥ // 16 //
analyzed: tasya api nirabhisaṃdhinaḥ kāryāntara abhāvāt vidyāsaṃgati upapattiḥ  /
agnihotra ādi tu

original: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ karma jñānānnaśyati na veti saṃdehe ubhe puṇyapāpe taratītyaviśeṣaśruternaśyatītyāśaṅkyottarasyāpītyuktātideśasya
analyzed: nityam naimittikam karma jñānāt naśyati na vā iti saṃdehe ubhe puṇya pāpe tarati iti aviśeṣa śruteḥ naśyati iti āśaṅkya uttarasya api iti ukta atideśasya
nitya ādi atirikta kāmya puṇya viṣayatvena atra apavādam siddhāntayati puṇyasya ityādinā
atra pūrvapakṣe jñāna artham nitya ādi anuṣṭhāna asiddhiḥ paṅka kṣālana nyāyāt
siddhānte tu jñāna itpatti artha tvāt tad siddhiḥ iti vivekaḥ

original: atra bhāṣye jñānakarmaṇoḥ sākṣādekakāryatvaṃ paramatenoktvā sākṣātpāramparyābhyāṃ mokṣahetutvaṃ svamatamuktamiti mantavyam /
analyzed: atra bhāṣye jñāna karmaṇoḥ sākṣāt eka kāryatvam para matena uktvā sākṣāt pāramparyābhyām mokṣa hetu tvam sva matam uktam iti mantavyam
atas eva iti jñānāt ūrdhvam karma abhāvāt pūrva karma viṣayam iti arthaḥ

original: nirguṇavidyāyāḥ karmasāhityaṃ tṛptiṃ prati bhojanasya lāṅgaleneva darśitaṃ,
analyzed: nirguṇa vidyāyāḥ karma sāhityam tṛptim prati bhojanasya lāṅgalena iva darśitam
saṃprati saguṇa vidyā paratvena sūtrasya añjasyam āha saguṇāsu iti

start

original: kiṃviṣayaṃ punaḥ idam aśleṣavināśa vacanaṃ kiṃviṣayaṃ vā ado viniyogavacanam ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ  #
analyzed: kiṃviṣayam punar idam aśleṣa vināśa vacanam kiṃviṣayam vā adaḥ viniyoga vacanam ekeṣām śākhinām tasya putrāḥ dāyam upayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhu kṛtyām
dviṣantaḥ pāpa kṛtyām iti
atas uttaram paṭhati
atas nya api hi ekeṣām ubhayoḥ  /

original: ataḥ agnihotrādeḥ nityātkarmaṇaḥ anyāpi hi asti sādhukṛtyā yā phalam abhisaṃdhāya kriyate tasyā eṣa viniyoga ukta ekeṣāṃ śākhinām 'suhṛdaḥ  #
analyzed: atas agnihotra ādeḥ nityāt karmaṇaḥ anyā api hi asti sādhu kṛtyā yā phalam abhisaṃdhāya kriyate tasyāḥ eṣa viniyogaḥ uktaḥ ekeṣām śākhinām suhṛdaḥ  /
sādhu kṛtyām upayanti iti

original: tasyā eva ca idam aghavat aśleṣavināśanirūpaṇam itarasya api evam aśleṣa iti /
analyzed: tasyāḥ eva ca idam agha vat aśleṣa vināśa nirūpaṇam itarasya api evam aśleṣaḥ iti

original: tathā jātīyakasya kāmyasya karmaṇo vidyāṃ prati anupakārakatve saṃpratipattiḥ ubhayoḥ api jaiminibādarāyaṇayoḥ ācāryayoḥ // 17 //
analyzed: tathā jātīyakasya kāmyasya karmaṇaḥ vidyām prati anupakāraka tve saṃpratipattiḥ ubhayoḥ api jaimini bādarāyaṇayoḥ ācāryayoḥ  /
uttara sūtra artham gṛhṇāti kim ityādinā

original: yatprārabdhādanyatkāmyaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca tadeva vidvatsuhṛddviṣatoḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ karma janayati svayaṃ ca jñānānnaśyatīti bhāvaḥ //17//
analyzed: yat prārabdhāt anyat kāmyam puṇyam pāpam ca tat eva vidvat suhṛd dviṣatoḥ sva samāna jātīyam karma janayati svayam ca jñānāt naśyati iti bhāvaḥ

start
vidyā jñāna sādhana adhikaraṇam sū
yat eva vidyayā iti hi

original: samadhigatam etat anantara adhikaraṇe nityam agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣuṇā mokṣaprayojana
analyzed: samadhigatam etat anantara adhikaraṇe nityam agnihotra ādikam karma mumukṣuṇā mokṣa prayojana
uddeśena kṛtam upātta durita kṣaya hetu tva dvāreṇa sattva śuddhi kāraṇa tām pratipadyamānam

original: mokṣaprayojanabrahma adhigamanimittatvena brahmavidyayā saha ekakāryaṃ bhavati iti /
tatra agnihotrādi karmāṅgavyapāśrayavidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca asti /
analyzed: tatra agnihotra ādi karma aṅga vyapāśraya vidyā saṃyuktam kevalam ca asti

original: 'ya evaṃ vidvānayajati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñjuhoti' 'ya evaṃ vidvāñchaṃsati' 'ya evaṃ vidvāngāyati' 'tasmādevaṃvidameva brahmāṇaṃ kurviti nānevaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ evam vidvān a yajati yaḥ evam vidvān juhoti yaḥ evam vidvān śaṃsati yaḥ evam vidvān gāyati tasmāt evaṃvidam eva brahmāṇam kuru iti na anevam
vidam chā

original: 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.1.10)
analyzed: tena ubhau kurutaḥ yaḥ ca etat evam veda yaḥ ca na veda chā

original: ityādivacanebhyo vidyāsaṃyuktam asti kevalam api asti /
analyzed: ityādi vacanebhyaḥ vidyā saṃyuktam asti kevalam api asti

original: tatra idaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ vidyāsaṃyuktameva agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣoḥ vidyāhetutvena
analyzed: tatra idam vicāryate  kim vidyā saṃyuktam eva agnihotra ādikam karma mumukṣoḥ vidyā hetu tvena

original: tayā saha ekakāryatvaṃ pratipadyate na kevalam uta vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca aviśeṣeṇa iti /
analyzed: tayā saha eka kārya tvam pratipadyate na kevalam uta vidyā saṃyuktam kevalam ca aviśeṣeṇa iti

original: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti yajñādīnāmvi aśeṣeṇa ātmavedanāṅgatvena śravaṇāt /
analyzed: kutas saṃśayaḥ tam etam ātmānam yajñena vividiṣanti iti yajña ādīnām vi aśeṣeṇa ātma vedanā aṅga tvena śravaṇāt
vidyā saṃyuktasya ca agnihotra ādīnām aviśeṣa tva avagamāt

original: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ vidyāsaṃyuktam eva karmāgnihotrādi ātmavidyāśeṣatvaṃ pratipadyate na vidyāhīnam /
analyzed: kim tāvat prāptam vidyā saṃyuktam eva karma agnihotra ādi ātma vidyā śeṣa tvam pratipadyate na vidyā hīnam
vidyā upetasya viśiṣṭa tva avagamāt vidyāvihīnāt
yat ahar eva juhoti tat ahar punarmṛtyum apajayati evaṃvidvān ityādi śrutibhyaḥ
buddhyā yuktaḥ yayā pārtha karma bandham prahāsyasi
dūreṇa hi avaram karma buddhi yogāt hanañjaya
ityādi smṛtibhya ca iti

original: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - yadeva vidyayā iti hi /
analyzed: evam prāpte pratipadyate yat eva vidyayā iti hi
satyam etat

original: vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ karmāgnihotrādikaṃ vidyāvihīnāt karmaṇaḥ agnihotrāt viśiṣṭaṃ vidvāniva brāhmaṇo vidyāvihīnāt brāhmaṇāt /
analyzed: vidyā saṃyuktam karma agnihotra ādikam vidyā vihīnāt karmaṇaḥ agnihotrāt viśiṣṭam vidvān iva brāhmaṇaḥ vidyā vihīnāt brāhmaṇāt

original: tathā api na atyantam anapekṣaṃ vidyāvihīnaṃ karmāgnihotrādikam /
analyzed: tathā api na atyantam anapekṣam vidyā vihīnam karma agnihotra ādikam

original: kasmāt - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti aviśeṣeṇa agnihotrādeḥ vidyāhetutvena śrutatvāt /
analyzed: kasmāt tam etam ātmānam yajñena vividiṣanti iti aviśeṣeṇa agnihotra ādeḥ vidyā hetu tvena śruta tvāt

original: nanu vidyāsaṃyuktasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyāvihīnāt viśiṣṭatva avagamāt vidyāvihīnam agnihotrādi ātmavidyāhetutvena anapekṣameva iti yuktam /
analyzed: nanu vidyā saṃyuktasya agnihotra ādeḥ vidyā vihīnāt viśiṣṭa tva avagamāt vidyā vihīnam agnihotra ādi ātma vidyā hetutvena anapekṣam eva iti yuktam
na etat evam

original: vidyāsahāyasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyānimittena sāmarthya atiśayena yogāt ātmajñānaṃ prati kaścit kāraṇa atiśayo bhaviṣyati na tathā vidyāvihīnasya  #

original: kṛtaḥ iha tvabātmakaprāṇasya annātmakamanaḥprakṛtitvena prakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugrahānna manaḥśrutirbādhyeti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ pūrvavat,

original: siddhāntastvabannayoḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāve 'pi na tadvikārayoḥ prāṇamanasostadbhāvo himaghaṭayorapi tadbhāvaprasaṅgādato nyāyavirodhātpūrvavacchrutirbādhyeti  #

original: āgṛhītā bāhyendriyavṛttayo yena tattathā līnendriyavṛttikaṃ mano 'pi vṛttilayenaiva prāṇe līyata ityarthaḥ /

original: 'anādimatparaṃ brahma'ityādyā smṛtirdṛśyaviśeṣasya dṛśi kalpitatvāddṛgātmano nirviśeṣateti nyāyaḥ /

sa guṇam eva brahma sūtra ātma apekṣayā param gantavyam

kim nirviśeṣasya asattvam māna bhāvāt sa viśeṣa śruti virodhāt vā
na adya iti āha na iti
dvitīyam śaṅkate utpatti ādi iti
sa viśeṣa śrutīnām nirviśeṣa śruti śeṣa tvāt na virodhaḥ iti āha na iti

original: vikārāvayavarūpajīvaviśiṣṭasyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthiratvājjīvānāṃ gatyāgatī na syātām /
